text: @GovCTW @realDonaldTrump @GOPChairwoman @GOP political strategy failed. Inciting protests will kill People.  @realDonaldTrump remains stupidly obstinate narcissist, out of his depth in presidency. Alerted of #COVID19 early January. failed to act. He is solely responsible for highest #COVID19 death toll.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
